section.title: What's new in Pustefix 0.22.0
section.para: Added support for Spring 5. The minimum requirement now is Spring version 4.3.

Pustefix states used as Spring MVC controllers with RequestMappings now work either with the deprecated Spring WebArgumentResolvers, or with HandlerMethodArgumentResolvers. Using Spring 4.3 both are supported by Pustefix, since Spring 5 HandlerMethodArgumentResolvers are required (see and ).
